name: Enemy (itch) (incuriousforms)
description:
ENEMY

A short interactive fiction story written in 72 hours for Minijam #103. The theme was darkness and the limitation was You are your own enemy.

You live a peaceful life, having managed to extricate yourself from your country's war. You don't like to think about how. But you're forced to when your old friend, now captain of a rebel fleet, comes looking for you and a way to fight the endless government soldiers who all have your body...

  • Uncover your past regrets, and decide to run or face them.
  • Choose how your complicated relationship with Zihan (M/F) will end.
  • Fight against your own worst instincts, because even in a world where copies of you are literally soulless soldiers, your mind is still your own worst enemy.
  • 3 possible endings!

Some language & references to war/violence.

Play in full-screen. The save function has not been tested.

Written by Kira Pelletier, using INK.
